item.title: XKCD's Collatz Conjecture
item.description: In the XKCD comic dated 3/4/2010, the Collatz Conjecture presents the following scenario: Well I don’t know if your friends will stop calling your or not, but I was curious about what the graph would actually look like. The graph in the comic looks like it was created with Graphviz, one of my favorite programs! So I wrote a quick bash script to generate the approrpiate links for graphviz to interpret:
